contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Russian town |en_name=Zmeinogorsk |ru_name=Змеиногорск |image_skyline= |image_caption= |latd=51 |latm=09 |lats= |longd=82 |longm=12 |longs= |map_label_position=top |image_coa= |coa_caption= |image_flag= |flag_caption= |anthem= |anthem_ref= |holiday= |holiday_ref= |federal_subject=[[Altai Krai]] |federal_subject_ref= |adm_data_as_of= |adm_district_jur=[[Zmeinogorsky District]] |adm_district_jur_ref= |adm_ctr_of=Zmeinogorsky District |adm_ctr_of_ref= |inhabloc_cat=Town |inhabloc_cat_ref= |inhabloc_type= |inhabloc_type_ref= |mun_data_as_of= |mun_district_jur= |mun_district_jur_ref= |urban_settlement_jur= |urban_settlement_jur_ref= |mun_admctr_of= |mun_admctr_of_ref= |leader_title= |leader_title_ref= |leader_name= |leader_name_ref= |representative_body= |representative_body_ref= |area_of_what= |area_as_of= |area_km2= |area_km2_ref= |pop_2010census=10955 |pop_2010census_ref=<ref name="2010Census">{{ru-pop-ref|2010Census}}</ref> |pop_density= |pop_density_as_of= |pop_density_ref= |pop_latest= |pop_latest_date= |pop_latest_ref= |established_date=1736 |established_title= |established_date_ref= |current_cat_date=1952 |current_cat_date_ref= |prev_name1= |prev_name1_date= |prev_name1_ref= |postal_codes= |postal_codes_ref= |dialing_codes= |dialing_codes_ref= |website= |website_ref= |commonscat= |date=May 2010 }} '''Zmeinogorsk''' ({{lang-ru|Змеиного́рск}}) is a [[types of inhabited localities in Russia|town]] and the [[administrative center]] of [[Zmeinogorsky District]] of [[Altai Krai]], [[Russia]], located on the [[Korbolikha River|Korbolikha]] (the [[Aley River|Aley]]'s [[tributary]]) and [[Zmeyevka River]]s. Population: {{ru-census|p2010=10,955|p2002=11,625|p1989=12,232}} ==History== It was founded in 1736 and granted town status in 1952.{{citation needed|date=May 2010}} ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://zmeinogorsk.ru/ Unofficial website of Zmeinogorsk] {{ru icon}} {{Altai Krai}} {{Use mdy dates|date=January 2013}} [[Category:Cities and towns in Altai Krai]] [[Category:Populated places established in 1736]] {{AltaiKrai-geo-stub}}
